law.catch_line: Any of the following individuals may apply to participate in the Program:...

text.section:
Any of the following individuals may apply to participate in the Program:
an individual acting on the individual's own behalf;
a parent or guardian acting on behalf of a minor who resides with the parent or guardian; or
a guardian acting on behalf of a disabled person.

section.section:
On the filing of a properly completed application and release, the Secretary of State shall:
review the application and release; and
if the application and release are properly completed and accurate, designate the applicant as a Program participant.
An applicant shall be a participant for 4 years from the date of filing unless the participation is canceled or withdrawn prior to the end of the 4-year period.
A Program participant may withdraw from participation by filing a signed, notarized request for withdrawal with the Secretary of State.
